title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIII, pt. 573 - Operating Certificate Issuance And Limitation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIII, pt. 573 - Operating Certificate Issuance And Limitation

State Regulations
§ 573.1 - Issuance of operating certificate
§ 573.2 - Special requirements for eligibility for operating certificates applicable to business corporations
§ 573.3 - Denial of application for or limitation of initial operating certificate
§ 573.4 - Revocation, cancellation, limitation or suspension of any operating certificate
§ 573.5 - Temporary suspension or limitation of any operating certificate

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIII, pt. 573

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§7.09, 9.39, 31.02, 31.03, 31.04, 31.05, 31.15, 31.17, 31.22, 43.02

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
